mapper.sql: id, name, account, password, phone, sex, email, createtime, updatetime
mapper.select: select * from user where account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
name,
account,
password,
phone,
sex,
email,
createtime,
updatetime,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE user SET name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
